description: This file is a bash script implementing command-line tools to interact with OCI containers, enabling starting, stopping, listing, getting info/state, pausing, resuming, and executing commands inside containers through curl-based JSON-RPC calls.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container using an OCI bundle from the specified directory or path.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves detailed info about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Gets the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a running container with optional parameters.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information about available commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop handling user input commands and dispatching container operations.
